title: Undercover Journalist Finds Afghan Women Are Being Abducted & Imprisoned By Taliban
description: Journalist Ramita Navai went undercover in Afghanistan to film her new PBS Frontline documentary and found that girls and women are being arrested for violating the morality code. Also many girls are abducted and forced to marry Talibs.
